label: specifiedLineTradeSettlement
comment: A line trade settlement specified for this supply chain trade line item.

rangeIncludes.comment: The information, at a line level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of information specific to an item being used or reported on for supply chain trade purposes.
